Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class RemoteActionsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.RemoteActionsHandler
  • public class RemoteActionsHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to handle user's decision about which actions they want to go for. This class is placed in server's side and has public methods that can be called from the client (in remote) in order to communicate the player's decisions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      IEvent<RemoteActionsHandler,​RemoteAction.Data> actionDataRequired
      Event other classes can subscribe to.
      private java.util.List<Action> actions
      List of actions that can be selected and executed if the client communicates to.
      Player player
      Reference to the player the list of remote actions is associated with
      private java.util.List<WeaponCard> possibleWeapons  
      private Action selectedAction
      Action that as been selected from the user and is ready to be executed

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addDiscardedAmmo​(int index)
      Discards the ammo card associated with the index, by first getting all the ammo cards relative to the selected action and then finding the one that occupies the "index" position on the list.
      void addDiscardedPowerUp​(int index)  
      void addPowerUp​(int index)
      Uses the power up card associated with the index, by first getting all the power ups relative to the selected action and then finding the one that occupies the "index" position on the list.
      void addTargetPlayer​(int index)
      Adds the player associated with the index to the targets list, by first getting all the possible target players associated with the selected action and then finding the one that occupies the "index" position on the list.
      void addTargetSquare​(int index)
      Adds the square associated with the index to the targets list, by first getting all the possible target squares associated with the selected action and then finding the one that occupies the "index" position on the list.
      void addWeapon​(int index)
      Adds the weapon card associated with the index, by first getting all the weapons relative to the selected action and then finding the one that occupies the "index" position on the list.
      void askActionData()
      Invokes the actionDataRequired event.
      boolean canBeDone()  
      void chooseAction​(int index)
      Based on the input index, this method calculates which action it corresponds to and then proceeds to make said action the selected one.
      java.util.List<RemoteAction> createRemoteActions()
      Creates a list of remote actions based on the actions list in the global parameters section
      void doAction()
      Calls the doAction method on the action that's been previously selected
      private RemoteAction.Data getActionData()  
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDiscardableAmmos()  
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDiscardablePowerUps()

    • Field Detail

      • actionDataRequired

        public final IEvent<RemoteActionsHandler,​RemoteAction.Data> actionDataRequired
        Event other classes can subscribe to. When this event is invoked, it notifies every subscriber. This event is invoked when the askActionData method is called.

      • player

        public final Player player
        Reference to the player the list of remote actions is associated with

        List of actions that can be selected and executed if the client communicates to.

        Action that as been selected from the user and is ready to be executed

    • Method Detail

      • createRemoteActions

        public java.util.List<RemoteAction> createRemoteActions()
        Creates a list of remote actions based on the actions list in the global parameters section
        Returns:
        The list of remote actions newly created

      • chooseAction

        public void chooseAction​(int index)
        Based on the input index, this method calculates which action it corresponds to and then proceeds to make said action the selected one.
        Parameters:
        index - Integer representing the position of the selected action in the list of possible actions.

      • doAction

        public void doAction()
        Calls the doAction method on the action that's been previously selected

      • addPowerUp

        public void addPowerUp​(int index)
        Uses the power up card associated with the index, by first getting all the power ups relative to the selected action and then finding the one that occupies the "index" position on the list.
        Parameters:
        index - Integer that represents the position of the selected power up card on the list.

        Parameters:
        index - Integer that represents the position of the selected weapon card on the list.
